attributes.action: re-nationalise public transport and make it affordable to all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: if the government decides to go ahead and start road pricing then all monies raised should be used to provide a public transport network providing low cost transport for all. the railways, tube and bus companies should be government run and all income re-invested. give the people affordable public transport and they will use it. stop the profiteering of the private sector, let us all be able to move around and not have to break the bank doing it. affordable public transport for the public, everyone should be able to travel in this country affordably.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
